message: @Alex3917 Ok - yeah, I'd say that's too broad of a subject. I'd imagine there are probably good online communities for every niche you've mentioned. (for varying definitions of 'good').
@Alex3917 Very interesting! Sorry I couldn't be more of a help :-)
Anyone know if there is a good online community for the creators of consumer packaged goods?
Could something like this be built using Google App Engine? I'm a GAE noob trying to figure out its limitations.
@bgraves E.g. people who make packaged foods, beverages, cosmetics, games, gadgets, etc... I realize that's fairly broad though
@Alex3917 Can you be more specific? Not sure what you mean by "the creators of consumer packaged goods". Do you have a specific good in mind, or just in general?
@kwellman I'm certain it could be done
@bgraves Makes sense... We're basically just looking for a couple more interesting products to feature at our next Swagapalooza (www.swagapalooza.com) event, fwiw
@bgraves haha no worries, it's a tricky problem. I'm sure there is something, but google is too broken to turn up anything
I can just see @pg 's post on HN tomorrow: "HN now serving hardly any page views on weekdays...thanks to convore!"
@kwellman I build all my projects on GAE, its pretty solid, checkout my projects at http://initlabs.com
